workspaceId.description: Workspace numeric identifier where the dataset is stored.

organizationId.description: Organization numeric identifier that owns the dataset.

lastUpdatedBy.description: User who last updated the dataset.
lastUpdatedBy.title: UserInfo

description.description: Optional description of the dataset contents and purpose.

mediaType.description: MIME type of the dataset file. Accepts text/csv or text/tsv.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the dataset was created.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the dataset was last modified.

deleted.description: Whether the dataset has been deleted (soft delete).

resource.description: Whether this is a resource label (applied to workflow tasks for compute resource allocation).

isDefault.description: Whether this label is automatically applied to new resources by default.

isDynamic.description: Whether this label's value can be dynamically computed from workflow metadata.

isInterpolated.description: Whether this label contains interpolated variables resolved at runtime.

dateCreated.description: Timestamp when the label was created.

items.description: Label object for categorizing and organizing resources (workflows, pipelines, compute environments, actions, datasets).
items.title: LabelDbDto

labels.description: Labels associated with the dataset for organization and filtering.

version.description: Current version number of the dataset (increments with each update).

items.description: Dataset metadata object containing information about a dataset in a workspace or user context. Datasets store tabular data and file references for workflow inputs.
items.title: DatasetDto

datasets.description: Array of dataset objects with metadata.

schema.description: Response containing a list of datasets in a workspace or user context.
schema.title: ListDatasetsResponse
